data.comment: The whistle has gone to start the match.
Throw-in Atlas.
In the minute 1, It's a goal kick for the away team in Ciudad Juarez.
In Ciudad Juarez a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Cesar Arturo Ramos signals a free kick to Juarez in their own half.
In the minute 4, Juarez push forward at Estadio Olimpico Benito Juarez and Gustavo Velazquez gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Atlas defence.
Throw-in for Atlas at Estadio Olimpico Benito Juarez.
Ball safe as Atlas is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 8, Cesar Arturo Ramos awards the away team a throw-in.
Mauro Fernandez is on target to give Atlas a 0-1 advantage.
Juarez to take a throw-in in Atlas territory.
In the minute 14, Juarez have been awarded a corner by Cesar Arturo Ramos.
Goal kick for Atlas at Estadio Olimpico Benito Juarez.
Free kick for Atlas in their own half.
In the minute 16, Juarez awarded a free kick in their own half.
Corner awarded to Juarez.
Corner awarded to Juarez.
In the minute 18, Juarez's Dario Lezcano misses with an attempt on goal.
Cesar Arturo Ramos awards Atlas a goal kick.
Cesar Arturo Ramos signals a free kick to Juarez.
In the minute 21, Atlas awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Ignacio Malcorra for Atlas is whistled offside.
Cesar Arturo Ramos signals a free kick to Juarez in their own half.
In the minute 24, Throw-in for Atlas in their own half.
Atlas awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Juarez in the half of Atlas.
In the minute 29, Throw-in for Juarez at Estadio Olimpico Benito Juarez.
Ball safe as Atlas is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick for Juarez in their own half.
In the minute 31, Ignacio Malcorra for Atlas has been booked by Cesar Arturo Ramos and receives a first yellow card.
Atlas's Javier Correa gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Juarez have a goal kick.
In the minute 34, Throw-in for Juarez in the half of Atlas.
Ignacio Malcorra (Atlas) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Atlas have been awarded a corner by Cesar Arturo Ramos.
In the minute 37, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Marco Fabian (Juarez) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Free kick Atlas.
In the minute 41, Cesar Arturo Ramos awards the home team a throw-in.
Cesar Arturo Ramos signals a free kick to Atlas in their own half.
Can Atlas get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Juarez's half?
In the minute 43, Cesar Arturo Ramos signals a Atlas throw-in in Juarez's half.
Throw-in for Atlas in the half of Juarez.
Juarez awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 45, 2 minutes will be added to the 1st half in Ciudad Juarez.
Ball goes out of play for a Juarez goal kick.
Marco Fabian (Juarez) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 45, Juarez have been awarded a corner by Cesar Arturo Ramos.
Corner awarded to Juarez.
Cesar Arturo Ramos blows to end the first-half.
In the minute 46, The second-half is underway in Ciudad Juarez.
Can Juarez capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Atlas's half?
In the minute 46, Throw-in high up the field for Juarez in Ciudad Juarez.
Ignacio Jeraldino is replacing Javier Correa for the away team.
Throw-in Atlas.
Juarez awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 50, Free kick for Juarez in the half of Atlas.
Juarez have been awarded a corner by Cesar Arturo Ramos.
Free kick for Atlas in their own half.
In the minute 55, Juarez's Dario Lezcano is on target but unsuccessful.
Corner awarded to Juarez.
Cesar Arturo Ramos signals a free kick to Atlas in their own half.
In the minute 57, Atlas pushes forward through Renato Ibarra, whose finish on goal is saved.
In Ciudad Juarez, Martin Rabunal of Juarez is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Throw-in for Juarez in their own half.
In the minute 59, In Ciudad Juarez a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Juarez drive upfield and Marco Fabian gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Atlas defender.
Cesar Arturo Ramos awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 60, Juarez awarded a throw-in in their own half.
William Mendieta is replacing Flavio Santos for Juarez at Estadio Olimpico Benito Juarez.
Blas Armoa is on a sub for Mauro Fernandez for Juarez.
In the minute 63, Corner awarded to Atlas.
In Ciudad Juarez Atlas drive forward through German Conti. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Jesus Isijara for Atlas who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
In the minute 66, Juarez have a dangerous throw-in.
Ball safe as Atlas is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Juarez have been awarded a corner by Cesar Arturo Ramos.
In the minute 69, Goal kick for Atlas at Estadio Olimpico Benito Juarez.
Free kick Atlas.
In the minute 71, Juarez to take a throw-in in Atlas territory.
Atlas make their second substitution with Alan Reyes replacing Angel Marquez.
Atlas's Jesus Isijara is back in action after a slight knock.
Cesar Arturo Ramos signals a free kick to Juarez.
In the minute 74, Atlas have a goal kick.
Free kick Juarez.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Ciudad Juarez.
In the minute 76, In Ciudad Juarez a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Free kick for Juarez in the half of Atlas.
The home team replace Alberto Acosta with Victor Omar Manon.
In the minute 79, Juarez awarded a free kick in their own half.
Corner awarded to Juarez.
Throw-in for Atlas in their own half.
In the minute 81, The away team have replaced Ignacio Malcorra with Anderson Santamaria. This is the third substitution made today by Diego Cocca.
Brian Rubio is on a sub for Jefferson Intriago for Juarez.
Juarez are pushing forward but Dario Lezcano's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 87, Ball goes out of play for a Atlas goal kick.
Camilo Vargas (Atlas) has received a yellow card from Cesar Arturo Ramos.
Throw-in for Atlas at Estadio Olimpico Benito Juarez.
In the minute 89, Important block from the Atlas defence as Marco Fabian fires in a strike for Juarez.
Free kick for Juarez in their own half.
Cesar Arturo Ramos signals a free kick to Juarez.
Free kick for Atlas in their own half.
4 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Cesar Arturo Ramos signals a Atlas throw-in in Juarez's half.
Throw-in Atlas.
The second-half is over. The match ends 0-1.
Jonathan Herrera is replacing Jesus Isijara for the away team.
Juarez's Maximiliano Olivera has been booked in Ciudad Juarez.
